Uses of Interface
EventManager.EventHandler

  • Uses of EventHandler in EventManager

    Fields in EventManager with type parameters of type EventHandler 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Class<? extends Event>,​java.util.HashMap<EventHandler,​java.util.ArrayList<EventCaller>>> EventManager._eventHandlers
    HashMap that permit to retrieve all EventCaller from an class that extends Event and an EventHandler object
    Methods in EventManager with parameters of type EventHandler 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void EventManager.addEventCaller​(java.lang.Class<? extends Event> event, EventHandler eventHandler, EventCaller eventCaller)
    Method that register an EventCaller by it's event type and it's EventHandler
    void EventCaller.call​(EventHandler eventHandler, Event event)
    Method that describe what happen when being called by EventManager
    void EventManager.register​(EventHandler eventHandler)
    Method that allow you to register an EventHandler to be able to listen for thrown events This method create EventCaller for every methods in the EventHandler that doesn't contains the NotListening tag and which got an Event related class
    void EventManager.registerEvent​(java.lang.Class<? extends Event> event, EventHandler eventHandler, EventCaller eventCaller)
    Method that allow you to register an event and use your own EventCaller
    protected void EventManager.sortEventCallers​(java.lang.Class<? extends Event> event, EventHandler eventHandler)
    Method that sort EventCaller of a specific event and eventHandler
    void EventManager.unregister​(EventHandler eventHandler)
    Method that allow you to unregister all EventCaller related to an EventHandler, so methods of this EventHandler wont receive thrown events anymore
